devdoc.custom:provides-interfaces: IEIP2981 IRoyalty IRaribleV1 IRaribleV2 IFoundation IEIP2981RoyaltyOverride

defaultRoyalty().details: Default royalty for all tokens without a specific royalty.

getTokenRoyaltyByIndex(uint256).details: Get a token royalty configuration by index.  Use in conjunction with getTokenRoyaltiesCount to get all per token configurations

devdoc.title: ERC2981 - Royalty

userdoc.notice: Provide standard on-chain EIP-2981 royalty support for ERC721 or ERC1155 tokens, and additional functions for Rarible and Foundation.
